original_text: These be those that were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the word of the Lord by the hand of Moses.
korean_text: 이는 모세와 아론이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 므라리 자손들의 종족 중 계수된 자니라

sentences.original_text: These be those that were numbered
of the families of the sons of Merari
according to the word of the Lord
